The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 07 March is 40,547 (4,693 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 02 March, there were 418 new confirmed cases (48.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 23 February, there were 703 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 41% (285 fewer cases).
